mapper.update: update b_stat set interviewresult=1 where id=#{id};
update b_stat set interviewresult=-1 where id=#{id};
mapper.select: select s.*,u.realname from b_stat s,s_user u where s.phonenumber=u.phonenumber and s.id=#{id};
select count(*) from (select count(phonenumber) from b_stat GROUP BY phonenumber,interviewresult HAVING interviewresult=1) t
select count(DISTINCT phonenumber) from b_stat where TO_DAYS(interviewtime) = TO_DAYS(now())
select FORMAT((select count(*) from b_stat where interviewresult=1)/(select count(*) from b_stat),2)*100 AS R
select s.*,u.realname from b_stat s,s_user u where s.phonenumber=u.phonenumber and s.interviewresult=1
select (select count(DISTINCT phonenumber) as a from b_stat) as allcount,(select count(DISTINCT phonenumber) from b_stat where interviewresult=1) as successcount
select CONCAT(u.realname,' - ',s.companyname) as title,s.interviewtime as start,s.id as statid from b_stat s,s_user u where s.phonenumber=u.phonenumber
